item.description:
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming!
Some light snacks & refreshments will be provided. To help keep the cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up.

Time: 7 - 9 pm

Parking:
Free parking with no sticker or pass required is available across the street on Fresh Pond LANE (not Place-corrected). Park on that street then cross the parkway carefully to my home at 87 Fresh Pond Parkway, a brick house with decks and yellow trim.
*********************************************
Shannon Brophy and Susan Conley, BostonLOA members and "Abraham" enthusiasts, are welcoming members who are interested and working with the Abraham materials to come together to have fun, raise vibration and focus in a forward looking direction to make their dreams come true!

To get acquainted, we will do an exercise in which each person introduces themselves, shares about 2-3 minutes with the group one of the Abraham-Hicks processes that has helped them to turn downstream and focus positively on what they want and has helped reduce/eliminate resistance.

We will listen to some excerpts/questions from an Abraham-Hicks workshop, and then have a group discussion of impressions, realizations and thoughts.

We will do a small group/pair exercise where we better learn one of the processes and exercises, such as the Focus Wheel Process. Learn how to use this process to reduce resistance on an issue where you're feeling "stuck" or feel like you’re not moving forward so that you may get into your Vibrational Escrow.

We will be molding the clay here and having fun with our individual desires……as Abraham says, "We are always evolving so you never get it wrong because you never get it done!"

*******************************************************************
Shannon Brophy:
http://lawofattractio...

Susan Conley
http://lawofattractio...

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Abraham Hicks Discussion
